note.p: Death: Greenwood, near Bishop's Waltham, Hampshire (11 December 1898)

Career: Set up in practice near Regent's Park; Professor of Pathological Anatomy, University College, London; Assistant Physician, University College Hospital; Physician, Hospital for Sick Children (1852); Physician, London Fever Hospital (1853); Physician in Ordinary to Queen Victoria (1861) and attended Prince Albert in his last illness; Professor of Medicine, University College, London; retired (1889)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 28-29 signed by W R G
Notes: George Burrows has signed the election certificate twice
